title: How to Set Up Automated Appointment Reminders
description: Reduce no-shows by 50% with automatic text and email reminders.
requirements: An online booking system (Calendly, Jobber, or similar)
Your customers' phone numbers or emails
5 minutes to write a reminder message

steps.title: Check your current booking tool
steps.description: Most booking tools have built-in reminders — you just need to turn them on.
substeps: Calendly: Has free email reminders built-in
Jobber/HouseCall Pro: Has text and email reminders
Google Calendar: Can send email reminders (basic)
If you don't have a booking tool, start with Calendly (free)
steps.tip: Text reminders get 98% open rates. Email is good, text is better.

steps.title: Set up reminders in Calendly
steps.description: Turn on the free reminder feature.
substeps: Log into calendly.com
Click on your event type
Go to 'Communications' or 'Notifications'
Turn on email reminders (24 hours and 1 hour before work great)
Customize the message if you want

steps.title: Set up text reminders (if your tool supports it)
steps.description: Text reminders are the most effective.
substeps: In Jobber/HouseCall Pro: Go to Settings → Notifications
Enable 'Appointment Reminders'
Choose when to send (24 hours + 2 hours before is ideal)
Add your business name to the message so they know who it's from
steps.tip: Include: Date, time, address, and your phone number in case they need to reschedule.

steps.title: Write a good reminder message
steps.description: Keep it short and include all the essential info.
substeps: Example: 'Reminder: [Your Business] appointment tomorrow at 9am. Address: [their address]. Questions? Call [your number]. See you then!'
Include a way to confirm or reschedule
Keep it under 160 characters if texting (to avoid splitting)

steps.title: Alternative: Use Google Calendar reminders
steps.description: A free backup option if you don't have a booking tool yet.
substeps: When adding an event, click 'Add notification'
Set email or SMS reminder (SMS requires setup)
Add the customer as a guest so they get reminders too
This is manual but works in a pinch

successMessage: Your customers now get automatic reminders! No-shows will drop dramatically.
proTips: Send two reminders: one 24 hours before and one 1-2 hours before
Ask customers to confirm — 'Reply YES to confirm' catches issues early
If someone no-shows, follow up with a reschedule offer instead of writing them off
